properties.description: Business consulting and services company headquartered in Saudi Arabia; 429 employees, $50M annual revenue, founded 1977, operating in management consulting industry. The firm serves both government and private sectors, emphasizing technical expertise and professional advisory services.

# About ABANA

ABANA’s journey began in 1977, and today we stand as a leading company in providing  business solutions, digital transformation, and bespoke technology services for both government and business sectors in Saudi Arabia

We always aspire to be the most trusted partner for our clients, distinguished by providing comprehensive and customized solutions that meet their needs and contribute to their success. We are also committed to promoting sustainability and business growth.

[Read More](https://abana.com.sa/en/about)

## Your digital transformation journey begins here

Our expertise lies in designing and implementing integrated business solutions tailored to the unique needs of both the government and private sectors in Saudi Arabia

### Network and Infrastructure Solutions

company.name: ABANA Enterprises Group Co.
company.about:
ABANA is a Saudi Business Solutions company serving the government and private sectors since 1977. The company specializes in the development and provision of various end-to-end solutions that deliver on our clients requirements and enhance their businesses.

With robust processes, dependable infrastructure, and experienced workforce, ABANA is capable of providing advanced end-to-end solutions backed up by robust technical support in mission critical situations around the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

Snapshot of ABANA:

-	46 years of solid experience in the Saudi Arabian Market.
-	Kingdom-wide service coverage through 21 service centers.
-	4 main maintenance centers.
-	Kingdom-wide logistical coverage including warehouses and transportation fleet.
-	Managing +25,000 live terminals around the kingdom.
-	24/7 helpdesk center with comprehensive service management tool.
-	+1000 employees, including +600 engineers, technicians, and support staff.
-	In-house software development team. 
-	ISO9001:2008 certified since 2007.

evaluations.reasoning: The company has 429 employees, which falls within the required range of between 201 and 500

evaluations.criterion: Company is headquartered or primarily operates in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA)
evaluations.reasoning: The internal company profile explicitly states that ABANA Enterprises Group Co. is "headquartered in Saudi Arabia." The company’s website domain (abana.com.sa) also indicates a Saudi presence. This satisfies the criterion that the company is headquartered or primarily operates in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

references.snippet: ABANA Enterprises Group Co. is a Business Consulting and Services company (private) with 429 employees (-1.0% YoY growth), $50.0M annual revenue, founded in 1977, headquartered in Saudi Arabia. Haven Diving Services is an equipment servicing and repair centre based in milford haven. They offer a range of services including air/nitrox fills, regulator servicing, suit repair, idest cylinder testing, and recreational diving courses. They have over 60 years of experience diving in Pembrokeshir...

evaluations.criterion: Company operates in the consulting management industry
evaluations.reasoning: ABANA Enterprises Group Co. is described as a Business Consulting and Services company in its internal profile, indicating that management consulting is a core part of its business. The company’s website and LinkedIn profile also highlight technical expertise and consulting services aimed at government and private sectors, confirming it provides professional advisory services to organizations. This aligns with the definition of the consulting management industry.
